/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city.
